name: Snake Xenzia Classic: Retro
description:
In 2006 and many years later, I and my generation were crazy by playing Snake Xenzia.

One day, I and my friends gathered, talked about mobile game and of course, Snake Xenzia is top of mind. So, I decided to remake it to celebrate our youth with the very 1st mobile game experience.
Let’s experience the past in the present!

Best Regards from Vietnam,

HALA Games
